document_data.mainbody: 'Melori Ostur''' ({{Pronounce|MEH|lor|ee|_|OH|stir|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Flames of Kythorn|29}}}}) was a sergeant of the [[City Watch (Mulmaster)|City Watch]].
document_data.History: Around [[1491 DR]], Melori led a City Watch patrol that arrived at the [[Wave and Wink]] dance hall after an arson attack on Zora [[Tiega Gos]]. He immediately arrested [[Kata Brizik]] and forcibly shut the Wave and Wink down.{{Cite adventurers league/Flames of Kythorn|13}}
document_data.Personality: Melori was willing to arrest a woman without investigating, just to show off to nobles and impress his superiors in the watch.
